section.title: Document Information
section.para: This document aims at guiding a system administrator throughout the parameterisation and administration of for a typical deployment environment.

The document initially provides an in-depth description of the application properties set-up, specially addressing the key parameters that must be correctly and carefully set-up to ensure the correct behaviour of , and additional parameters already set-up in the default configuration that could be of some use in order to implement a specific behaviour.
